reviewText: This show is like a "60 Minutes" show for the nature world.  Great camera work and interesting people bringing up subjects that you may want to follow up on.  These are 30 minutes shows so it is great for those short fill in times instead of clicking through the 150+ chanels with nothing on.  I would rather my dollar go to these products that to a cable company.
Title: National Geographic: Wild Chronicles: Season 1 Collection

reviewText: I felt this series is not as impressive as other National Geographic Nature presentations. It is still viewable, but there are better presentations from the BBC and PBS.
summary: Not as impressive as other NG Nature programs
Title: National Geographic: Wild Chronicles: Season 1 Collection

reviewText: I am an advid collector/viewer of the world's wildlife.As a nature conservationist, I believe the current National Geographic Series of Wild Chronicles which depict animals in the wild should be very interesting to both students and grownups. We need to conserve our wonderful wildlife all over the world when the pressure of increasing human population, global warming and the fast-dwindling forests have created conditions that are so adversed to all existing  mammals, particularly in the savannah regions of Africa, the rainforests of Asia and the Amazon land mass in South America.I highly recommend the National Geographic Wild Chronicles to those of us who cheerish the suvivability and sustainability of these animals  in the face of adverse changes around the global. They could be here today and who knows if they still could make it tomorrow. Hence, these chronicles would serve as a permanent record of the fabulous wildlife on Planet Earth. So go for the series while stock lasts.Cheers.
summary: National Geographic Wildlife - Best of the best!
Title: National Geographic: Wild Chronicles: Season 1 Collection

reviewText: I'M GLAD I PURCHASED THIS SET.  THEY ARE ONLY 30 MINUTE SEGMENTS, BUT THERE ARE 32 EPISODES IN ALL, MAKING IT A GREAT VALUE!
Title: National Geographic: Wild Chronicles: Season 1 Collection

reviewText: Spectacular series, providing multiple vignettes in each episode. Lots of great television for the money.
Title: National Geographic: Wild Chronicles: Season 1 Collection
